AccountForm.input.username.label: Username
AccountForm.input.username.error.too-sho: Username must be at least 6 characters long
AccountForm.input.username.error.too-lon: Username must be at most 20 characters long

AccountForm.input.email.error.already-as: An account is already linked to this email address

PasswordForm.input.newPassword.error.sam: The new password must be different from the current password
PasswordForm.input.password.error.too-sh: New password must be at least 6 characters long
PasswordForm.input.password.error.too-lo: New password must be at most 20 characters long
PasswordForm.input.confirmPassword.label: Confirmation of the password
AISettings.input.maxTokens.label: Maximum number of tokens:
AISettings.input.maxTokens.tooltip: The maximum number of tokens determines the length of the generated answers. The higher the number, the more detailed the answers will be, but this will consume more credits.
AISettings.input.temperature.label: Temperature:
AISettings.input.temperature.tooltip: The generation temperature determines the level of risk taken by the model when generating responses. The higher the temperature, the more random and unpredictable decisions the model will make in its responses, which may result in more original and interesting responses, but also in less sensible or relevant responses.
AddModifyOpenaiKeyModal.text.add: Add a valid OpenAI key with credits to generate stories.
AddModifyOpenaiKeyModal.input.key.label: Key to OpenAI
DeleteOpenaiKeyConfirmMoal.title: Delete your OpenAI key
DeleteOpenaiKeyConfirmMoal.text: Are you sure you want to delete your OpenAI key?
